Online Appendix A Factor Score Weights We employ principal factor analysis using the measured inputs reported in Figures 2 and 3 (separately by age) to create age-specific predicted investment factor scores for each child using the Thomson (1951) method. Estimated weights for each factor used in constructing the scores are reported in Table A. For interpretation purposes, scores are normalized to have a mean of zero and standard deviation of one.
